channel.title: Problem Connecting Multiple WorkstationVM to GatewayVM
channel.description:
Is anyone else having problems connecting more than one workstation VM to a single gateway VM? If I sign into another workstation VM while another is already connected the first workstation VM drops network activity. Say for example, I have pidgin running in Workstation A and load Workstation B for e-mail or Workstation C for browsing workstation A will drop connection.
It works fine when one gatewayVM is per workstationVM and this is obviously ideal but for this particular scenario I would like to connect multiple VMs to a single gateway VM.

item.title: Problem Connecting Multiple WorkstationVM to GatewayVM

item.description:
thanks for input everyone. Indeed I forgot to change the IP address.

Read full topic

item.description:
Did you follow instructions from this page?

Whonix

Multiple Whonix-Workstations

Compartmentalization. Better separation of different tasks and/or pseudonyms by using multiple Whonix-Workstations.
